channel.title: Command help? (Emote of acting drunk)
channel.description: I was wondering if it is possible to make a command that sets your standing animation to the drunk standing animation and a command that sets your walking animation to the drunk animation (like drinking a keg of beer, but without the drinking and the keg of beer). I host my own server and I use fr33sc4pe. I've been dieing to make this command and yet all the things I've done myself never worked. Someone please help me with this problem. :|[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 02:56:22 AM[/size][hr]No one likes to help a noob? :confused:

item.title: Command help? (Emote of acting drunk)
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

for the [code]client.java:11730: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if (command.startsWith(“setemote”) && playerRights

= 1 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
^[/code]
u need a ) after the >= 1

Read full topic

item.title: Command help? (Emote of acting drunk)
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

Command worked successfully! You can now walk around drunk for as long as you like!

But now i need to figure a way to turn it off…

Help on this?

Read full topic

item.title: Command help? (Emote of acting drunk)
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

You Know If You Drink A Keg You Get That Animation…

Read full topic

item.title: Command help? (Emote of acting drunk)
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You can create a command of acting drunk.
You need to emote identification first, if you tell me it.
I’m sure i can make you a command.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help? (Emote of acting drunk)
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

kyle22111:

There was a tut for this lol but it got locked =(

ADFEUJWGFAWDFHGADFHBSDWFGFASDVASDDAS!!! NOOOOOOOOOOOO SOMETHING I ALWAYS WANTED TO DOOOOOOOO :([br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 04:50:57 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Muffinator, post:1, topic:74334”]I was wondering if it is possible to make a command that sets your standing animation to the drunk standing animation and a command that sets your walking animation to the drunk animation (like drinking a keg of beer, but without the drinking and the keg of beer). I host my own server and I use fr33sc4pe. I’ve been dieing to make this command and yet all the things I’ve done myself never worked.
Someone please help me with this problem. :|[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 02:56:22 AM[/size][hr]No one likes to help a noob? [/quote]

I figured half of it now… I just want to know if it is possible to make an command activate an emote…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 05:10:30 AM[/size][hr]Ok I attempted to make a command… but when I compile the client, i get 62 errors.
